description: Grants the user paw pads on their hands that can repel anything they touch, including physical objects, attacks, and even abstract concepts like pain and fatigue. The user becomes a Paw Human.

users.circumstances: Bartholomew Kuma consumed this fruit at an unknown time before becoming a Warlord of the Sea

abilityReveals.description: The user can extract all accumulated pain, damage, and fatigue from a person's body by repelling it out, creating a compressed bubble of concentrated suffering.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kuma uses this ability to extract all of Luffy's accumulated pain and damage from the Thriller Bark battles, creating a massive paw-shaped bubble of agony.

abilityReveals.description: After extracting pain and damage into a bubble, the user can transfer it to another person who will experience all of that suffering at once.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kuma transfers Luffy's pain to Zoro, who voluntarily absorbs the massive bubble of concentrated agony to save his captain.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can repel abstract concepts like pain and fatigue, not just physical matter
strengths.description: The fruit's power extends beyond physical objects to intangible things like accumulated damage and suffering.

strengths.strength: Extracted pain can be weaponized or used to heal allies
strengths.description: By removing someone's pain and damage, Kuma can effectively heal them while potentially using that pain against enemies.
